tasks.title: Design homepage
tasks.description: Create wireframes and mockups for the main landing page including hero section, features, and call-to-action buttons

tasks.title: Setup authentication
tasks.description: Implement user login and registration with JWT tokens and password hashing

tasks.title: Create user dashboard
tasks.description: Build responsive dashboard with user statistics, recent activities, and navigation menu

tasks.title: Write unit tests
tasks.description: Add comprehensive test coverage for authentication, API endpoints, and core business logic

tasks.title: Deploy to staging
tasks.description: Configure CI/CD pipeline and deploy application to staging environment for testing

tasks.title: API documentation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive API documentation using Swagger/OpenAPI specification

tasks.title: Mobile responsiveness
tasks.description: Ensure all pages work perfectly on mobile devices and tablets

tasks.title: Performance optimization
tasks.description: Optimize loading times, implement lazy loading, and reduce bundle size

tasks.title: Security audit
tasks.description: Conduct thorough security review and fix any vulnerabilities found

tasks.title: User feedback integration
tasks.description: Implement feedback collection system and analytics tracking
